title: Life: An Autopsy
description: A book of poetry examining a life of love, loss, longing and redemption. Jaden takes the reader on a journey through the human body, traveling through the experiences and people who create the whole.Landscapes traversed include the longing of lovers past, the hope of lovers future, and the sensuality of lovers present.From the angst of new love to the devastation of love lost, Jaden will take you along on the exploration of the human mind, a living autopsy.40 poems18+ for violent or sexual imagery
author: Jaden Wilkes
